scripts.migrate: docker compose run --rm asl-schema sh -c 'npm run migrate' && docker compose run --rm asl-workflow npm run -w asl-workflow migrate
scripts.seed: docker compose run --rm asl-schema sh -c 'npm run seed' && docker compose run --rm asl-workflow npm run -w asl-workflow seed
scripts.build-search-index: docker-compose run --rm asl-internal-search sh -c 'npm run indexer -w asl-search -- --reset'
